Identify college visit opportunities in conjunction with existing family travel plans

For example, "Work on x applicaiton" could turn into "Work on Coalition application" and "Work on UC application"

For example, "Work on x applicaiton" could turn into "Work on Coalition application" and "Work on UC application"
